description: A woman is being supported by officers after being attacked at gunpoint in Port Erin, police say.
title: Port Erin man in court over rape of woman at gunpoint
title_page: Port Erin man in court over rape of woman at gunpoint - BBC News
maintext: Appealing for witnesses, a spokesman for the Manx force said police want to hear from anyone near Ballafurt Road and the Falcons Nest pub between 21:15 and 21:30 or close to Rushen Football Club between 21:20 and 23:30 on the day of the attack.
